name: singularityapp
title: SingularityApp
description: Check your SingularityApp tasks and add new ones quickly
author: alikhil

commands.name: home
commands.title: My Tasks
commands.description: Show your Singularity tasks and views (inbox, today, upcoming, completed, projects, tags).

preferences.name: view
preferences.title: View
preferences.description: Indicates which view you want to see in the command.

commands.name: add-task
commands.title: Add Task
commands.description: Create a new task in SingularityApp

commands.name: set-api-token
commands.title: Set API Token
commands.description: Save your SingularityApp API token for use in other commands

commands.name: set-max-count
commands.title: Set Max Tasks Count
commands.description: Configure how many tasks to fetch per request (workaround for API pagination limitation)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
